name: WCCBCharlotteNewsHeadlines
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
As part of your Flash Briefing, the latest headlines from WCCB, Charlotte's CW updated hourly.

Add WCCB Charlotte to your Flash Briefing and move it up your news list in your Alexa app settings. 

After adding WCCB, you can say "Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?" or "Alexa, what's in the news? to hear the headlines.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
